content: materials 100% cotton medium weight yarn 4 4 00mm crochet hook scissors darning needle stitch marker gauge 4″ square = 9 stitches wide x 10 row tall pattern notes *this pattern uses us crochet terms *chain 1 does not count as a stitch *number of stitches indicated between <> *single_crochet 2 means 1 single_crochet in the next 2 stitches
